name: kafka-connect-cassandra
title: Kafka Connect Cassandra
description: The Confluent Cassandra Sink Connector is used to move messages from Kafka into Apache Cassandra. The currently-supported versions of Cassandra are 2.1, 2.2, and 3.0. It can be used for free for 30 days, but after that does require a Confluent Enterprise license. Contact Confluent for more details.

support.summary: This connector is fully supported by Confluent as of Confluent Platform 5.0.0, as part of a Confluent Enterprise Platform subscription.
